column1: Vasily Vasiliyevich Tsibliyev (Russian: ??????? ?????????? ???????); born on February 20, 1954) is a Russian cosmonaut.
He was selected as a cosmonaut on March 26, 1987.
Tsibliyev is currently Chief of the Yuri Gagarin Cosmonauts Training Center at Star City, Russia.
Tsibliyev is married with two children.
Tsibliyev was the commander in charge of Mir when it was hit by a Progress spacecraft in 1997.
